get.summary: Get a custom value by key.

post.summary:
Post data to the extension.
Everything in the body will be sent to the extension.

put.summary:
Put data to the extension.
Everything in the body will be sent to the extension.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to delete.

post.summary: This endpoint is called when an entity has been created.

requestBody.description: Information about the entity that was created.

post.summary: This endpoint is called when an entity has been updated.

requestBody.description: Information about the entity that was updated.

post.summary: This endpoint is called when an entity has been deleted.

requestBody.description: Information about the entity that was deleted.

post.summary: This endpoint is called when a link has been created.

requestBody.description: Information about the link that was created.

post.summary: This endpoint is called when a link has been deleted.

requestBody.description: Information about the link that was created.

post.summary: Before adding the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will be added.

post.summary: Before creating a new version of the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will create a new version.

post.summary: Before deleting the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will create be deleted.

post.summary: Before locking the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will create be locked.

post.summary: Before unlocking the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will create be unlocked.

post.summary: Before updating the entity, the extension can modify the entity.

requestBody.description: The entity that will create be unlocked.

post.summary: Before adding the link, the extension can modify the link.

requestBody.description: The link that will be added.

post.summary: Before updating the link, the extension can modify the sort order.

requestBody.description: The link that will be updated.

post.summary: Before updating the link, the extension can modify the link.

requestBody.description: The link that will be updated.

200.description: A 200 response means that the server is healthy.
A 200 response means that the server is healthy.
